archimate:DataObject.name: PolicyRule
archimate:DataObject.documentation: This is a concrete base class for realizing the event-condition-passaction-failaction semantics that form a policy rule. The semantics of this rule are that the rule is evaluated when an event occurs. If the condition clause is satisfied; then the pass-action clause will be executed (otherwise; the fail-action clause will be executed). PolicyRules may be nested within PolicyRules. This is often needed in networking (e.g.; bandwidth allocation). However; their execution semantics are different than if a PolicyGroup is contained by a PolicyRule.
